body:
Hey guys,
dodgy here :3

    So as you can see by the title I might be quitting Minecraft. I am partly doing this because we never got around to doing my interview. But I don't care about that anymore. So, tomorrow imma be doing an Avicus & TeamSpeak Party, which will make me decide weather I should leave or stay.

When: Tomorrow at 12 PM PST
Where: Avicus TeamSpeak & And server!

(I will also be on both right now!)

Thanks For Reading,
dodgy :3

(P.S. Don't make a comment saying "Don't make leaving posts"

title: Maybe Quitting Mc. Avicus & Teamspeak Party!

replies.body:
Someone that REALLY didnt care about Avicus and would REALLY be quitting wouldn't make a post about it because he still cares about the persons on the forums and hes afraid of leaving them not knowing...

(If that makes sense)


:P


Sounds like a cool party

replies.body:
Im not going to say "dont make leaving posts"
im going to say dont make a post saying you MIGHT be leaving, thats just sounds like you're looking for attention, maybe keep that part to yourself and continue with the party?

replies.body: I would come to the party but I am going to a gold camp, it ends at 12 and then I go on the driving range for another hour and a half and practice my 7 iron and my driver :3
